1.verse: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;

2.verse: For the truth's sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.

3.verse: Grace be with you, mercy, and peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.

4.verse: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.

5.verse: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.

6.verse: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.

7.verse: For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.

8.verse: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.

9.verse: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.

10.verse: If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not into your house, neither bid him God speed:

11.verse: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.

12.verse: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.

13.verse: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
